content: plush heart crochet pattern by fionadolls fionadolls plush heart crochet pattern notes thank you for the ordering the pattern this pattern is designed by fionadolls and it is for private use only it s forbidden to sell distribute reproduce and republish the pattern and to translate it into other languages or exchange it with other patterns you can sell the toys you made with the help of this pattern thank you if you have any questions please feel free to contact me on etsy ig @fionadolls https //www instagram com/fionadolls or via e-mail soldyu@mail ru i will really appreciate if you share your project on ig using the hashtag #fionadolls and tag @fionadolls 1 plush heart crochet pattern by fionadolls materials and tools ● original yarn plush yarn dolce yarnart 120m 131 yds /100g in red color 748 - 10g you can substitute these yarns with another not plush bulky yarn with hook 4mm substitute plush yarn himalaya dolphin baby 120m 131 yds /100g velvet by bernat 288m 315yds /300g baby bee adore a ball 100g/84m icecream deluxe by lion brand 142m 155 yds /142g you can find plush yarn on etsy amazon lovecrafts joann s walmart and hobby lobby ● hook us size g/6 4 mm ● fiber fill stuffing ● scissors skill level easy basic crocheting skills required you can use any yarn to make this amigurumi for example if you use a smaller hook and a suitable yarn the toy will be smaller while maintaining the same proportions finished measurements approximately 3 in/ 7 5 cm high using original yarn and hook g/6 4 mm gauge 14 single_crochet sts × 14 row = 4 in x 4 in / 10 cm x 10 cm using hook us size g/6 4 mm crochet abbreviations us terminology double_crochet - double_crochet decrease decrease increase increase repeat repeat round s - round s single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch st s - stitch s repeat the content of the parenthesis as many times as the number after parenthesis says the number after = is the total number of stitches in the round beginning all pieces are worked in a spiral continuously this means that you do not end the round 2 plush heart crochet pattern by fionadolls with a slip_stitch and do not start a round with a chain i start working every piece from a magic_ring but you can ch2 and work the necessary number of single_crochet in the second st from the hook you should crochet tight enough to prevent stuffing from sticking out heart with red yarn and hook g/6 4 mm make a magic_ring round 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring = 6 sts round 2 increase 2 single_crochet in each st around = 12 sts round 3 single_crochet in each st around = 12 sts fasten_off leave the tail about 15 cm and cut the yarn one part is done repeat rnds 1-3 for the second part of the heart don t cut the thread when the second it
